attributes.action: Civil Injunctions to be available to all of the public
attributes.additional_details:
Civil injunctions are becoming more popular and are readily available for domestic and neighbours (within a 1mile radius) to stop them contacting you.

But what about those people who are not related to you and live further than 1mile away? There is no support available whatsoever, sign this petition and lets get this to the house of commons for a serious review!
